item.description:
We're cutting the price of our draft tournament on February 21! For just five dollars, you get three packs, play three rounds and keep what you draft. If you pay eight dollars, there is additional prize support:

3-0 record: 3 extra booster packs
2-0 with a tie: 2 extra packs
2-1 record: 1 extra pack

Our tournaments are held every Thursday at 7pm. All levels of experience are welcome! We are also holding a FREE FNM booster box tournament on February 22 (see other event for details!

Feel free to call 401-368-1619 if you have any questions or need help finding us!
item.name: $5 Draft Night at Untapped Games!
